1.Title: False Personas
1.Description: Increases CRIT DMG by <color=#2BAD00>45%</color>. When using an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color> to deal <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>, the equipper gains the <color=#FFFFFF>Absolute Zero Death Sentence</color> effect for 3s. While <color=#FFFFFF>Absolute Zero Death Sentence</color> is active, the character ignores <color=#2BAD00>25%</color> of the enemy's DEF when landing a hit.
